function.name: Sin
function.description: The Sine trigonometric function. Assumes that the input is in radians.

function.name: Sinc
function.description: The Sinc (sine cardinal) trigonometric function. Assumes that the input is in radians.

function.name: Cos
function.description: The Cosine trigonometric function. Assumes that the input is in radians.

function.name: Tan
function.description: The Tangent trigonometric function. Assumes that the input is in radians.

function.name: ArcSin
function.description: The ArcSine (inverse Sine) trigonometric function. Assumes that the input is in radians.

function.name: ArcCos
function.description: The ArcCosine (inverse Cosine) trigonometric function. Assumes that the input is in radians.

function.name: ArcTan
function.description: The ArcTangent (inverse Tangent) trigonometric function. Assumes that the input is in radians.

function.name: ArcTan2
function.description: The ArcTangent (inverse Tangent) trigonometric function, quadrant corrected. Assumes that the input is in radians.

function.name: RandomExpression
function.description: Calculates a random expression.

function.name: DisplayImage
function.description: Display the image at the given URL.

function.name: Plot
function.description: Make a plot of a function. The first parameter is an expression with one symbollic independent variable. The second parameter is a list in the format {var, min, max}, with var being the variable from the expression ranging over min to max values.

function.name: Pi
function.description: The Pi trigonometric constant. This can be used as a function or variable.

function.name: E
function.description: The exponential constant. This can be used as a function or variable.

function.name: GoldenRatio
function.description: The golden ratio.

function.name: FibonacciNumbers
function.description: The sequence of fibonacci numbers, calculated up to the specified length.

function.name: Random
function.description: Generate a random positive number less than 1.

function.name: Sqrt
function.description: The square root function.

function.name: Log
function.description: The logarithm of a number. The first argument is the base, the second is the input value.

function.name: Mod
function.description: Take the modulo of the two input parameters, giving the remainder from divding the first by the second.

function.name: DegreesToRadians
function.description: Convert the input degree value to radians.

function.name: RadiansToDegrees
function.description: Convert the input radians value to degrees.

function.name: Abs
function.description: Take the absolute value of the input number.
